About

Principles-driven, outcome-first delivery

Applied ML Engineer delivering production retrieval-augmented assistants and governed data platforms. Ship FastAPI + Postgres/pgvector systems, AWS Iceberg analytics stacks, and automation with measurable SLOs, GitHub Actions CI/CD, and cost guardrails.

Operating principles

  • SLO definition
  • Cost governance
  • Edge/webhook design
  • Incident runbooks
  • Security and data validation

Experience timeline

  1. Apr 2025 - Present

    Artificial Intelligence Specialist · La Capitale

    Dubai · Full-time

    Solo engineer for the data and AI platform: AWS Iceberg lakehouse, Superset 5.0 with RLS/embedded, and production chatbots on WhatsApp Cloud API with FastAPI webhooks and pgvector retrieval.

    • Designed and deployed an Apache Iceberg lakehouse on S3 with Glue Catalog and Athena SQL access.
    • Implemented Great Expectations validation keeping data loss under 1% on ~260k-row ingests.
    • Built Superset 5.0 dashboards with row-level security, deck.gl maps, and CRM embedding.
    • Version-controlled dashboards via YAML with GitHub Actions CI/CD and automated approvals.
    • Automated user onboarding via Superset REST with background workers on Redis and Celery.
    • Production WhatsApp Cloud API chatbots with FastAPI webhook + media workers and pgvector retrieval.
    • Defined SLOs: ingest success >= 99%, ingest p95 <= 60 s, assistant p95 5-8 s, documented runbooks.

  2. Sep 2024 - Present

    Co-Founder (Advisory) · BloomingdaleEducation

    India · Advisory

    Set up finance and security foundations while introducing AI as a teacher-assist advisor.

    • Established secure finance and operations foundations.
    • Deployed AI guidance for educators to augment lessons and feedback loops.

  3. Jan 2025 - Mar 2025

    AI Workflow Architect & Strategist Intern · GLEAC

    Dubai · Internship

    • Launched a chatbot increasing client interactions by 91% and reducing time waste by 33%.
    • Rolled out AI tools across Tech, QA, Sales, HR, and Admin and led staff upskilling.

  4. Nov 2022 - Mar 2023

    Digital Transformation Management Intern · EstAce Lauder

    Kuala Lumpur · Internship

    • Managed SAP Ariba data for 20,000+ clients and automated workflows cutting repetitive work by 48%.

  5. Jan 2019 - Jan 2019

    Artificial Intelligence Intern · Microsoft

    Dubai · Internship
